Description.Text: Nestled in New York City's fashionable East Side stands a hotel in Manhattan, unique in spirit and steeped in hospitality. The Kimberly Hotel New York provides guests with an intimate and unique experience in timeless elegance. Convenient to Grand Central Terminal, Rockefeller Center, Radio City Music Hall, Times Square, the Theater District, the United Nations, as well as some of the world’s most outstanding museums, popular attractions and luxury shopping, The Kimberly Hotel is the ideal destination for a business trip or well-earned vacation getaway.

• St. Patrick's Cathedral - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi • American Girl Place - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi • Sony Wonder Technology Lab - 0.6 km / 0.3 mi • Chrysler Building - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi • Museum of Television and Radio - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi • Rockefeller Plaza - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi • Grand Central Terminal - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi • Museum of Modern Art - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi • Broadway - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi • Times Square - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi • Empire State Building - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi • Central Park - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi • Brooklyn Bridge - 6.1 km / 3.8 mi • Ellis Island - 8.6 km / 5.3 mi • Statue of Liberty - 9.7 km / 6 mi

Well known for its spacious suites, the Kimberly Hotel stands out among the countless luxury hotels in Manhattan NY. The Kimberly Hotel is proud to introduce our Kimberly Luxury Suites. Our Luxury One Bedroom Suites are located throughout the hotel featuring fine antique-inspired furniture, Frette linens, 42 inch plasma-screen televisions, DVD players, iPod docking stations, balconies and much more. Each suite features upgraded personal amenities and enlarged marble-tiled bathrooms, some with jetted-tubs. Some rooms include separate showers, and most offer wall-mounted televisions. Each living room has a wet-bar area.

The Kimberly offers a 24-hour business center with high-speed Internet access (fee), faxing, copying, and courier service (fee). It offers complimentary use of the city's nine New York Health & Racquet Club locations, two of which are less than 2 blocks away, and complimentary rides on the hotel yacht in summer. The hotel also has a concierge, valet, and multilingual staff. Mid-July through September, guests 17 and older may take a complimentary three-hour cruise on the New York Health & Racquet Club’s yacht, which sails from the New York Skyport Marina through New York Harbor and the East River, offering views of the USS Intrepid and the Statue of Liberty. Sailing times are Wednesday and Saturday evenings, and Sunday afternoons. Meals and drinks are available (surcharge). Reservations are strongly suggested and can be arranged through the concierge.
Pets not allowed Check-in time is 3 PM Check-out time is Noon

• Ferro’s- Classic American menu. Serving three meals daily, as well as an extensive wine list and signature cocktail menu. • Nikki Midtown - Night club combining classic beach club elegance with Manhattan sophistication. Menu with an array of sushi, starters, tapas, and main courses. All-white decor, rustic wood tables, vaulted ceilings, and bamboo posts.
Luxury accommodations and superior service welcome you at the Kimberly Hotel
